name: Government Quest
description:
Lincoln (player) is trying to collect artifacts around the territory.  The artifacts will be used to ultimately free his people who have been imprisoned by the evil Stone Kingdom.  The artifacts will all deal with characteristics of the US Government.  For this prototype there is only the Core Dynamic of Exploring and Collecting.

Move around the map defeating the Stone Golems and collect the items they are protecting.

Arrow Keys: Move the player around the screen

Space Bar:  Fires the bullet in the direction the player is moving

Collecting Items: Run into items to collect
